abstract: California appears to have joined New York in weighing Exxon Mobil’s honesty in admitting to the risks posed by climate change.
snippet: California appears to have joined New York in weighing Exxon Mobil’s honesty in admitting to the risks posed by climate change.
lead_paragraph: California’s attorney general is investigating Exxon Mobil on whether the company lied to the public and shareholders about the risks of climate change, and whether the company’s statements over the years constitute violations of securities laws and other statutes.

headline.main: California Said to Target Exxon in Climate Inquiry
headline.print_headline: California Said to Target Exxon in Climate Inquiry

abstract: Ms. Vullo was nominated to lead the Department of Financial Services, which was created in 2011 to oversee Wall Street after the financial crisis.
snippet: Ms. Vullo was nominated to lead the Department of Financial Services, which was created in 2011 to oversee Wall Street after the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: After a monthslong delay, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo on Thursday named a new top financial regulator for New York State, nominating Maria T. Vullo, a prominent litigator with ties to his administration.

headline.main: Cuomo Picks Maria Vullo as State’s Top Financial Watchdog
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Chooses a Litigator to Be New York’s Top Financial Regulator
